intro: Bufonia tenuifolia var. trinervia, commonly known as the slender leaf bufonia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Southeast Asia. Bufonia tenuifolia var. trinervia is valued for its ornamental appeal and has some traditional medicinal uses in local herbal practices.
